module.sqlWrap: insert into TestEntity (Name, UpdateDate) values (@Name, @UpdateDate); select @@IDENTITY;
update TestEntity set Name=@Name,UpdateDate=@UpdateDate where TestId = @Id
select * from TestEntity where UpdateDate<@UpdateDate order by UpdateDate ,TestId
select * from TestEntity where UpdateDate<@UpdateDate and TestId in(ifnull(@IdList,TestId)) order by UpdateDate ,TestId
select * from TestEntity where UpdateDate<=@UpdateDate and TestId in (@IdList) order by UpdateDate ,TestId
